message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I propose a price of $140 for it. This price reflects its high quality and the value it offers, while also allowing us to cover our costs and maintain a fair profit margin. I look forward to your response.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of your product, I'm only able to pay $120 at this time. This is my maximum budget, but I'm confident it's a fair price considering the value I'm placing on it.  Let me know if you're willing to work with me on that price.
